description: Starts the workflow when Airtable events occur

essential_properties.name: baseId
essential_properties.description: The Airtable Base in which to operate on

essential_properties.name: triggerField
essential_properties.description: A Created Time or Last Modified Time field that will be used to sort records. If you do not have a Created Time or Last Modified Time field in your schema, please create one, because without this field trigger will not work correctly.

essential_properties.name: downloadFieldNames
essential_properties.description: Name of the fields of type 'attachment' that should be downloaded. Multiple ones can be defined separated by comma. Case sensitive.
